title: Find Two Points
text: Find two points on the graph whose coordinates are integers.
speech: Find two points on the graph whose coordinates are integers.
pacedSpeech: Find two points on the graph whose coordinates are integers.

title: Rise
text: Imagine a right triangle for this line as shown in the graph. Count the rise.\n##figure2.gif##
speech: Imagine a right triangle for this line as shown in the graph. Count the rise.\n##figure2.gif##
pacedSpeech: Imagine a right triangle for this line as shown in the graph. Count the rise.##figure2.gif##

title: Run
text: Count the run. It's the horizontal distance between the right angle and the line.
speech: Count the run. It's the horizontal distance between the right angle and the line.
pacedSpeech: Count the run. It's the horizontal distance between the right angle and the line.

title: Use Slope Formula
text: Use the slope formula: $$m=\frac{rise}{run}$$. Substitute the values of rise and run.
speech: Use the slope formula:  m is equal to fraction, rise over, r u n,  . Substitute the values of rise and run.
pacedSpeech: Use the slope formula:   m is equal to fraction, rise over, r u n,
. Substitute the values of rise and run.
